pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ kulaṃ ubhatopasannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.3: Saddhāya vaḍḍhati, bhogena hāyati, yaṃ tasmiṃ kule uppajjati purebhattaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā taṃ sabbaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vissajjetvā appekadā anasitā acchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.5: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā na mattaṃ jānitvā paṭiggahessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.6: Ime imesaṃ datvā appekadā anasitā acchantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.7: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.8: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.9: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.10: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṃ kulaṃ saddhāya vaḍḍhati, bhogena hāyati evarūpassa kulassa ñattidutiyena kammena sekkhasammutiṃ dātuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.14: Itthannāmaṃ kulaṃ saddhāya vaḍḍhati, bhogena hāyati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.15: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmassa kulassa sekkhasammutiṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.18: Itthannāmaṃ kulaṃ saddhāya vaḍḍhati, bhogena hāyati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.20: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa kulassa sekkhasammutiyā dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.23: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.24: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.25: “Yāni kho pana tāni sekkhasammatāni kulāni, yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu sekkhasammatesu kulesu khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, paṭidesetabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.26: ‘gārayhaṃ, āvuso, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ taṃ paṭidesemī’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:1.27: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṃ ussavo hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:2.5: “paṭikkhittaṃ bhagavatā sekkhasammatesu kulesu khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādituṃ bhuñjitun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:2.7: “kiṃ nu kho nāma amhākaṃ jīvitena yaṃ ayyā amhākaṃ na paṭiggaṇhantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:2.8: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:2.9: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:2.10: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:2.11: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, nimantitena sekkhasammatesu kulesu khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādituṃ bhuñjituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:2.12: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:2.13: “Yāni kho pana tāni sekkhasammatāni kulāni, yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu sekkhasammatesu kulesu pubbe animantito khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, paṭidesetabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:2.14: ‘gārayhaṃ, āvuso, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemī’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:2.15: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu tassa kulassa kulūpako hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:3.2: Atha kho so bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena taṃ kulaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:3.4: Atha kho te manussā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:3.7: “bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ animantitena sekkhasammatesu kulesu khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādituṃ bhuñjitun”ti kukkuccāyanto na paṭiggahesi;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:3.10: Atha kho so bhikkhu ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:3.12: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:3.13: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā sekkhasammatesu kulesu khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādituṃ bhuñjituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:3.14: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:3.15: “Yāni kho pana tāni sekkhasammatāni kulāni, yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu sekkhasammatesu kulesu pubbe animantito agilāno khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, paṭidesetabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:3.16: ‘gārayhaṃ, āvuso, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemī’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:4.1.1: Yāni kho pana tāni sekkhasammatāni kulānīti
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:4.1.2: sekkhasammataṃ nāma kulaṃ yaṃ kulaṃ saddhāya vaḍḍhati, bhogena hāyati. Evarūpassa kulassa ñattidutiyena kammena sekkhasammuti dinnā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:4.1.10: ajjatanāya vā svātanāya vā animantito, gharūpacāraṃ okkamante nimanteti, eso animantito nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:4.1.12: ajjatanāya vā svātanāya vā nimantito, gharūpacāraṃ anokkamante nimanteti, eso nimantito nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:4.1.18: pañca bhojanāni yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:4.1.20: pañca bhojanāni—odano, kummāso, sattu, maccho, maṃsaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:4.1.21: Animantito agilāno “khādissāmi bhuñjissāmī”ti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:4.2.1: Sekkhasammate sekkhasammatasaññī animantito agilāno khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:4.2.3: sekkhasammate asekkhasammatasaññī animantito agilāno khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:4.2.4: Yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:4.3.4: nimantitassa vā gilānassa vā sesakaṃ bhuñjati,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:4.3.12: yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ— “sati paccaye paribhuñjā”ti deti,
